Interface BusinessObjectDescriptor<T>

public interface BusinessObjectDescriptor<T>
extends Named, Labeled, Serializable

whoAffectsMe

BoPropertyDescriptor<?> whoAffectsMe(BoPropertyDescriptor<?> affected)
Asks this BusinessObjectDescriptor which of its property descriptors affects the argument. If the argument is not contained in getPropertyDescriptors() a RuntimeExcetion is thrown.

Parameters:
affected - Affected
Returns:
The affecting BoPropertyDescriptor
